entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Carleton-sur-Mer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 25 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
